mapper.insert: insert into case_apply (id, state, apply_type, ch_cat_1, ch_cat_2, address_id, msg_state, case_id, apply_user, apply_user_name, sur_user, sur_user_name, app_time, sur_time, contact_user, address, ch_count, approval_opinion, mail_time, apply_content, hurry_content, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chCat1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chCat2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{surTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contactUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{hurryContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
